General.Name: Herald Investment Trust
General.Description: Herald Investment Trust PLC is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Herald Investment Management Limited. It invests in public equity markets across the globe. The fund seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating in the technology, telecommunications, and multi-media sectors. It primarily invests in stocks of small-cap companies having market capitalizations lower than £750 million. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against a composite benchmark comprised of 33.33% Russell 2000 Technology Index and 66.66% Numis Smaller Companies Index. Herald Investment Trust PLC was formed on February 16, 1994 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Welken House, London, United Kingdom, EC1M 6EE
